sentence.Network_en: Hornblende bearing varieties bridge the gap over to amphibolites which are in bands and dikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 含角闪石的变种填补了带状和脉状角闪岩的中间相.

sentence.Network_en: Mineral constituents consist mainly of jadeite, aegirine - augite, magnesio - riebeckite, winchite , magnesio - hornblende, actinolite , quartz, albite, rutile and sphene.
sentence.Network_cn: 主要组成矿物为硬玉 、 霓辉石 、 镁纳闪石、蓝透闪石、镁角闪石、阳起石 、 石英 、 钠长石 、 金红石和榍石.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from German, from Horn 'horn' + blende (see blende)

means.word_mean: 1. a green to black mineral of the amphibole group; consists of silicates of calcium and sodium and magnesium and iron
